org.gbif.registry.search

Class SolrInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
      • org.gbif.registry.search.SolrInitializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class SolrInitializer
extends org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
    A Rule that will delete everything from SOLR ready for a new test. It is expected to do this before each test by using the following:
